basics.name: Ethan Garcia
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am currently studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2028.

work.summary: Sales Associate promoting products, providing customer servies, and supporting daily store operations
highlights: Delivered excellent customer service in a fast-paced retail environment
Handled cash register operations, sales transactions, and returns with accuracy
Maintained product displays and assisted with inventory stocking and organization
Collaborated with team members to ensure smooth store operations during peak hours
Demonstrated punctuality, responsibility, and adaptability in a dynamic work setting

work.summary: SWE Intern creating programs for satellites
highlights: Simulated orbital maneuvers, including Hohmann transfers and inclination changes
Built a Python program to model satellite behavior and visualize orbital data
Applied orbital mechanics concepts to real-world scenarios
Developed tools for collision avoidance and threat detection
Designed and trained object detection models for identifying ASAT (anti-satellite) launchers
Created and utilized a synthetic dataset to improve model accuracy and robustness

work.summary: GUI Design Intern contributing to the modernization of Star Fleet II: Krellan Commander.
highlights: Collaborated with a team to recreate and modernize UI screens for the game
Designed and implemented interactive buttons and menus to improve usability
Developed wireframes and layouts to align with gameplay needs and user experience best practices
Worked in a team-based, iterative design process to refine visuals and functionality
